trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you complete a task in the folder you specify.
This Trigger fires every time a new task is added to your Toodledo list with a tag you specify.
This Trigger fires every time a new task is added to your Toodledo list.
This Trigger fires every time a new task is added to a folder you specify.
This Trigger fires every time any task is completed in your Toodledo list.
This Trigger fires every time a new task is added to a context you specify
This Trigger fires every time you complete a task with a tag you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you complete a task in the context you specify.
